caption: Figure 2: Partial products identification accuracy before and after fine-tuning on tasks. Scores are reported on average of Gemma-2-2B and Llama-3.1-8B.
description: The chart displays the accuracy of identifying partial products in four different multiplication methods (standard, repetitive addition, lattice, and Egyptian) before and after fine-tuning.
